alert.note: Alert for Cotton; Jefferson; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 24 at 12:59AM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Jefferson, southwestern Stephens, southeastern Cotton, Clay, northeastern Archer and southeastern Wichita Counties through 145 AM CST... At 1259 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Burkburnett to 4 miles southwest of Jolly to 6 miles east of Windthorst. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita Falls, Duncan, Burkburnett, Henrietta, Waurika, Comanche, Temple, Ryan, Petrolia, Scotland, Byers, Dean, Randlett, Windthorst, Terral, Bellevue, Jolly, Hastings, Addington, and Sugden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
